about_the_game:
Deep in the jungle, a paranoid boy and a timid girl try to survive a world smoldering into ash. Pushed to the brink, they're confronted with the reality of what they really care about. Watch as they plunge together into the unknowable wilderness.

"Do You Care?" is an unusual surreal romance horror game, following the nameless boy and girl in their journey to both dive deep into themselves, and take the plunge into the great unknown.

To you, the player, I offer this:
  • An unnerving atmosphere.
  • An unusual story that may stick with you.
  • Romance Horror, full of tragedy.
  • A stylized cartoony aesthetic.
  • Numerous discoveries, events, and surprises.
  • An exploration of certain complicated sides of humanity.
  • A terrible hard to understand horror.

The creaking sticks replaced the bricks;
His rotting wood defaced by where you stood.
You should put on a smile, you'll be here for a while.
And if he doesn't like your face, you'll be my disgrace.

content_descriptors.notes: This game can be atmospherically oppressive, with some violent and gory scenes (including verbal, not shown, depictions of self-harm and suicide), no nudity but some themes of sexuality and pent-up frustration sexually, with some frightening and disturbing scenes. Please take care of yourself first and foremost, if playing the game may be a danger to your mental health, it be best to avoid this.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: Do You Care?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better Display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
